title: Embroidery Sample, ca. 1775–1805
medium:
Medium: silk taffeta, silk thread, silver wire, sequins and glass
Technique: embroidered on taffeta
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Formal foliate pattern, embroidered with white silk, silver wire and sequins and glass on a ground of purple taffeta.
